Table of Contents

Enum MPVEventId

Namespace
Nickvision.MPVSharp.Internal

Possible event Ids

public enum MPVEventId

Fields

AudioReconfig = 18

Happens after audio changed in some way

ClientMessage = 16

Triggered by the script-message input command

CommandReply = 5

Reply to MPVClient.CommandAsync()

EndFile = 7

Notification after playback end (after the file was unloaded)

FileLoaded = 8

Notification when the file has been loaded

GetPropertyReply = 3

Reply to MPVClient.GetPropertyAsync()

Hook = 25

Triggered if a hook handler was registered with MPVClient.HookAdd()

LogMessage = 2

Log message received

None = 0

Nothing happened

PlaybackRestart = 21

There was a discontinuity of some sort (like a seek), and playback was reinitialized

PropertyChange = 22

Event sent due to MPVClient.ObserveProperty()

QueueOverflow = 24

Happens if the internal per-mpv_handle ringbuffer overflows

Seek = 20

Happens when a seek was initiated

SetPropertyReply = 4

Reply to MPVClient.SetPropertyAsync()

Shutdown = 1

Happens when the player quits

StartFile = 6

Notification before playback start of a file (before the file is loaded)

VideoReconfig = 17

Happens after video changed in some way
